MediaStreamAudioDestinationNode.summary:
The MediaStreamAudioDestinationNode interface represents an audio destination consisting of a WebRTC with a single AudioMediaStreamTrack, which can be used in a similar way to a MediaStream obtained from {{domxref("MediaDevices.getUserMedia",
"navigator.mediaDevices.getUserMedia()")}}.

remarks.para: It is an that acts as an audio destination, created using the method.
